  "title": "Procurement Officer",
  "description": "Techdoctorinnovations, a Social Media Management, Rebranding, and Recruiment firm, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja / Opebi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Business Admin, Procurement, or related field
	Previous experience in purchasing or procurement (hospitality preferred)
	Strong negotiation and record-keeping skills
	Must be male
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;currencytechdoctor@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;For inquiries, WhatsApp: 09138885064.",

Procurement Officer Job at Techdoctorinnovations




        
    

        
        Techdoctorinnovations, a Social Media Management, Rebranding, and Recruiment firm, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Ikeja / Opebi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Minimum of OND in Business Admin, Procurement, or related field
	Previous experience in purchasing or procurement (hospitality preferred)
	Strong negotiation and record-keeping skills
	Must be male
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: currencytechdoctor@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For inquiries, WhatsApp: 09138885064.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Receptionist",
  "description": "Royal Power and Energy Limited -&nbsp;With over 10 years of experience in the Nigerian power industry, RPE is a total solution provider. Our expertise enables us to understand the market and deliver premium products and systems that offer high levels of reliability, affordability, serviceability, redundancy, and operational flexibility.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Receiving visitors and clients at the front desk by greeting, welcoming, directing and announcing them appropriately
	Ensure reception area is tidy and presentable
	Daily regular checks on all common areas, including bathrooms are clean and tidy at all times
	Manage the building log of who is entering and exiting the building
	Responding to all customer inquiries in a polite and timely manner
	Check visitors in and direct or escort them to specific offices
	Receive deliveries; sort and distribute incoming mail
	Answering phones in a professional manner, and routing calls as necessary
	Assisting and support administrative tasks
	Assisting with a variety of administrative tasks including photocopying, taking notes, monitoring diesel supply/usage/level
	Any other duties assigned by management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an NCE / OND qualification with 1-2 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@rpeltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },

       "postalCode": ". ",

Receptionist Job at Royal Power and Energy Limited




        
    

        
        Royal Power and Energy Limited - With over 10 years of experience in the Nigerian power industry, RPE is a total solution provider. Our expertise enables us to understand the market and deliver premium products and systems that offer high levels of reliability, affordability, serviceability, redundancy, and operational flexibility.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Receiving visitors and clients at the front desk by greeting, welcoming, directing and announcing them appropriately
	Ensure reception area is tidy and presentable
	Daily regular checks on all common areas, including bathrooms are clean and tidy at all times
	Manage the building log of who is entering and exiting the building
	Responding to all customer inquiries in a polite and timely manner
	Check visitors in and direct or escort them to specific offices
	Receive deliveries; sort and distribute incoming mail
	Answering phones in a professional manner, and routing calls as necessary
	Assisting and support administrative tasks
	Assisting with a variety of administrative tasks including photocopying, taking notes, monitoring diesel supply/usage/level
	Any other duties assigned by management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an NCE / OND qualification with 1-2 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@rpeltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
